trans-unit.source: Represents an in-memory representation of a SOAP fault that can be passed to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.CreateMessage*"></xref> to create a message that contains a fault.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> class any time you need an in-memory SOAP fault that can be modified and used to create a SOAP message that contains the fault information.
Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> class is used when implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler> interface.

In this case, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] passes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> object and you use it for your specific needs (for example, you can customize the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> or to log fault information).
However, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> can be used anywhere custom SOAP fault message handling is required.
When called in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the actor.
The value of the actor.
Gets the SOAP fault code.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref> that contains the SOAP fault code.

Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> and the specified maximum buffer size for the message buffer.
The specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> to be used to create the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object.
The specified maximum buffer size for the message buffer
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.

Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref> and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref> objects.
The fault code for the fault message.
The reason for the fault.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref> and fault reason.
The fault code for the fault message.
The reason for the fault.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.

Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref>, and detail object.
The fault code for the fault message.
The reason for the fault.
The fault detail object.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.

Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref>, detail object, and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> objects.
The fault code for the fault message.
The reason for the fault.
The fault detail object.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.

Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref>, detail object, <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref>, and actor.
The fault code for the fault message.
The reason for the fault.
The fault detail object.
The value of the actor.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.

Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object that uses the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultCode"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref>, detail object, <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref>, actor, and node values.
The fault code for the fault message.
The reason for the fault.
The fault detail object.
The value of the actor.
The value of the node.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> object with initial values from the passed in parameters.
Returns the detail object that uses the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> to use when deserializing the detail object.
The type of the detail object.
The detail object contained in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref>.
Returns the detail object of the message fault.
The type of the detail object.
The detail object of the message fault.
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> object that is positioned on the detail object of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> object that is positioned on the detail object of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> has a detail object.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref> has a detail object; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether this fault was caused by the failure to understand a SOAP header.
`true` if this fault was caused by the failure to understand a SOAP header; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets the SOAP node containing information about which SOAP node on a message path cause the fault.
The SOAP node containing information about which SOAP node on a message path cause the fault.

When called in a derived class, returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> object that is positioned on the detail object of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> object that is positioned on the detail object of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault"></xref>.
Invoked prior to writing the detail contents.
Override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault.OnWriteDetail%2A> method to participate in the detail writing process.
The default behavior is to call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault.OnWriteStartDetail%2A> followed by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault.OnWriteDetailContents%2A>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> used to write the detail element.
The version of the SOAP envelope to write.
When overridden in a non-abstract derived class, writes the contents of the detail element.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault.OnWriteDetailContents%2A> method is called subsequent to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault.OnWriteStartDetail%2A> and prior to writing the end element.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> used to write the detail element.
Writes the start element using the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> and SOAP envelope version.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> used to write the detail element.
The version of the SOAP envelope to write.
Gets a textual description of a SOAP fault.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref> that contains a textual description of a SOAP fault.
Gets a value indicating whether the SOAP message headers were understood.
The SOAP message headers.
The name of the header element.
The namespace of the header element.
`true` if message headers were understood; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Writes the message fault that uses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> and SOAP envelope version.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> used to write the message fault.
The version of the SOAP envelope to write.
Writes the message fault that uses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> and SOAP envelope version.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> used to write the message fault.
The version of the SOAP envelope to write.
